segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene that's quite peculiar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The single-basin sink is completely overflowing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streams continuously from the faucet, spilling over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It creates a widening puddle across the cabinet doors and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there seems entirely oblivious to this developing flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's diligently drying a plate with a dish towel, her gaze fixed solely on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly neutral, as if nothing out of the ordinary is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of awareness is truly astonishing to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is becoming quite messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical in a strange way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize.
segments.speaker: PAR
